CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Only Locations with an address are available for selection.
Please navigate to the Location screen to create a Location and set it's address.
CustomField.label: Location

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The Selected Booking Location does not have address. Please select a valid booking location with address
lookupFilter.infoMessage:
Only Booking Locations with an address are available for selection.
Please navigate to the Booking Location screen to create a Booking Location and set it's address.
